title: Karma is the New Merit - Algorithmic Charity Redistribution Proposal
author: Tokenista (VanKushFamily)

core_concept.description: Technical and philosophical framework for restructuring reward distribution on Graphene-based social blockchains
core_concept.goal: Replace subjective 'clique-based' merit with an algorithmic model that treats Charity as a Commodity

siring_model_algorithm.name: The Siring Model
siring_model_algorithm.measures: Not just how much an account votes, but the 'Karma' generated by those votes

base_formula.expression: (Number of Users Voted × BP Gained) × Neediness Weight
base_formula.bp_gained: Measures total Blockchain Power (BP) earned by sub-accounts after initial 'Sire' (the voter) supported them

sire_rank.mechanism: Rank increases based on how many 'successful' curators you have 'sired'
sire_rank.example: If you vote for a poor account and they become a wealthy, active curator, your 'Karma' score skyrockets

neediness_weight.purpose: Prevent Whales from only voting for each other
neediness_weight.formula: (Time on Platform × Recency Weight) / Total Historical Rewards
neediness_weight.stagnant_users: If account has been active for a year but received zero 'good votes', neediness value increases, pushing them to top of analytics for Whales to find

low_karma_0_100.behavior: Voting only for other Whales to get reciprocal upvotes

model_50_50.behavior: Seeking out the poorest users and giving them the most
model_50_50.classification: Charitable, but takes a hit on personal ROI

model_100_100_dharma.behavior: Seeking out poor users who then become active curators themselves

scot_bots_smart_contracts.description: Automated scripts that reward users with secondary 'Karma Token'

reverse_satoshi_model.mechanism: If user cashes out, their 'Stock' or reputation in Siring Charts is liquidated

punic_ecosystem_tokens.description: Family of tokens acting as 'Rosetta Stone' for new users to understand different blockchain architectures

punic_copper_puco.mechanism: Used for bulk-sender airdrops and 'Religious Currency' to trade seeds, herbs, and books
punic_copper_puco.lockup: 50% of supply (350M) frozen for 900 days to be managed by a DAO

punic_tin_puti.distribution: Rewards users for using specific community tags (ulogs, dtube, punicwax)
punic_tin_puti.longevity: Minting 1 token per minute, designed to distribute over 64 years with 5% annual inflation reduction

hellenization.historical_context: The spread of technology and art after Alexander the Great
hellenization.metaphor: Used for the spread of blockchain tech

kula_ring.mechanism: White shell necklaces traded for red shell bracelets
kula_ring.proof: Trade can be based on relationship-building rather than just profit

quantum_mysticism.justification: Redistribution of wealth to the 'needy' strengthens the entire network

loop_investment_strategy.name: Continuous Reinvestment Loop
steps: Convert to Blurt Power while Blurt is undervalued ($0.02)
Wait for the 'Blurt Bubble' ($1.00 - $20.00 range) driven by rarity/demand
Liquidate 1/3 to buy STEEM Power at low prices ($0.15)
Become a 'Whale' in that ecosystem and restart the cycle

concepts_expanded: High Karma vs Low Karma voting (page 12)

key_insights.charity_as_commodity: Treating charitable actions as measurable, tradeable value on the blockchain
key_insights.siring_over_staking: Reputation built by 'raising' successful curators rather than just holding tokens
key_insights.anti_whale_mechanism: Neediness Weight algorithmically pushes support toward underserved users
